title: Supplements
cleaned_text: of the TFM and include detailed instructions, worksheets, and guidelines for financial reporting and accounting procedures. They provide a reference for specific subject matter and contain tables and graphics to illustrate specific data. Supplements cover such areas as cash management, credit administration, and the United States Standard General Ledger.
